ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Sociology 560 01 is a course where professors from other institutions and sociology graduate students at Yale workshop their papers on a diverse range of topics in historical sociology, comparative research, and the sociology of religion.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It deepened my knowledge by exposing me to the broad range ofapproaches being used within a couple of fields.Also, reading and assessing the work of others always helps one's own writing.
